article_title: How Can I Get My Health Insurance to Pay for Mental Health Treatment?

article_metadata.author: Christina LaMontagne

og.description: Whether it’s inpatient mental health care or an outpatient surgery, health insurance denials can be costly and even dangerous. Fortunately, there is a potential solution in the appeals process.
